firstDescriptions.title: Professional rental management
firstDescriptions.content: You entrust us rental management of your apartments- so you may sleep quietly, because you give it into the real professionals, who bring you maximum earnings, and having spent minimum of your time, and bring culm, comfort and high level service.

firstDescriptions.title: Long and short rentals
firstDescriptions.content: Thanks to us, you may expect to expression of interest in your apartments, not only among tourists, who want to visit Batumi some days or weeks, but also among those, who are eager to stay in Batumi longer.

secondDescriptions.title: Long owner's stay
secondDescriptions.content: You want not only to earn on your apartments, but have a rest yourself? No problem, our flexible rules, no doubt, will be suitable for you.

secondDescriptions.title: Monthly settlements and reports
secondDescriptions.content: No surprises! You will know, how much money you have earned because of your apartments and how many days your guests have spent there.

secondDescriptions.title: International marketing
secondDescriptions.content: Our multi-lingual team will do everything possible to offer the renting of your apartments to all interested persons, any country they are from

questionnaireTitle: Are you interested in our offer? Complete the survey so that we can contact you.
